definitions.definition: Buying and/or selling in a market (street market or market fair).

subdefinitions.definition: Shopping , going to market as a buyer.

examples: Marketing was a time-consuming task for truck farming families, as the round trip could take most of the day.

definitions.definition: The promotion , distribution and selling of a product or service ; the work of a marketer ; includes market research and advertising .

main_definition: Buying and/or selling in a market (street market or market fair).
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The promotion , distribution and selling of a product or service ; the work of a marketer ; includes market research and advertising .
